spices.name: Cinnamon
spices.description: Sweet and woody spice from the inner bark of trees.
spices.uses: Baking, desserts, curries, and hot beverages
spices.funFact: Cinnamon was once more valuable than gold in ancient trade.

spices.name: Turmeric
spices.description: Bright yellow spice with earthy flavor.
spices.uses: Curries, rice dishes, and traditional medicine
spices.funFact: Known as 'Indian saffron' due to its vibrant color.

spices.name: Cardamom
spices.description: Aromatic spice with a complex flavor profile.
spices.funFact: One of the world's most expensive spices.
